verses.verse: To the chief Musician <S%H5329><s%> <S%H8764><s%> upon Mahalath <S%H4257><s%>, Maschil <S%H4905><s%> <S%H8688><s%>, A Psalm of David <S%H1732><s%>. The fool <S%H5036><s%> hath said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in his heart <S%H3820><s%>, There is no 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>. Corrupt <S%H7843><s%> <S%H8689><s%> are they, and have done abominable <S%H8581><s%> <S%H8689><s%> iniquity <S%H5766><s%>: there is none that doeth <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8802><s%> good <S%H2896><s%>.

'Elohim <S%H430><s%> looked down <S%H8259><s%> <S%H8689><s%> from heaven <S%H8064><s%> upon the children <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%>, to see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8800><s%> if there were <S%H3426><s%> any that did understand <S%H7919><s%> <S%H8688><s%>, that did seek <S%H1875><s%> <S%H8802><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>.

Havahry one of them is gone back <S%H5472><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: they are altogether <S%H3162><s%> become filthy <S%H444><s%> <S%H8738><s%>; there is none that doeth <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8802><s%> good <S%H2896><s%>, no, not one <S%H259><s%>.

Have the workers <S%H6466><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of iniquity <S%H205><s%> no knowledge <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%>? who eat up <S%H398><s%> <S%H8802><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> as they eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%>: they have not called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8804><s%> upon 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>.

There were they in great <S%H6343><s%> fear <S%H6342><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, where no fear <S%H6343><s%> was: for 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> hath scattered <S%H6340><s%> <S%H8765><s%> the bones <S%H6106><s%> of him that encampeth <S%H2583><s%> <S%H8802><s%> against thee: thou hast put them to shame <S%H954><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, because 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> hath despised <S%H3988><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them.

Oh that <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the salvation <S%H3444><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> were come out of TZiyon <S%H6726><s%> ! When 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> bringeth back <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the captivity <S%H7622><s%> of his people <S%H5971><s%>, Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> shall rejoice <S%H1523><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> shall be glad <S%H8055><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
